title: Secure Login
preconditions: User is on the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User has entered valid username and password
main_flow: 4. If credentials are valid, system displays a success message
5. User is redirected to a secure area
6. User has the option to logout from the secure area
If credentials are invalid, system displays an error message
If user clicks the "Log out" button, system logs user out and redirects them to the login page
postconditions: User is either logged in successfully or receives an error message for invalid credentials
User can logout from the secure area
